original_text: ‘Now an enemy will take power over Babylon! Everyone in the world praised it as a great nation. But now all the nations will see that it is a disgusting place. ‘Now an enemy will take power over Babylon! Everyone in the world praised it as a great nation. But now all the nations will see that it is a disgusting place. ‘Now an enemy will take power over Babylon! Everyone in the world praised it as a great nation. But now all the nations will see that it is a disgusting place. ‘Now an enemy will take power over Babylon! Everyone in the world praised it as a great nation. But now all the nations will see that it is a disgusting place. ‘Now an enemy will take power over Babylon!
korean_text: 슬프다 세삭이 함락되었도다 온 세상의 칭찬 받는 성읍이 빼앗겼도다 슬프다 바벨론이 나라들 가운데에 황폐하였도다

sentences.original_text: Now an enemy will take power over Babylon!
Everyone in the world praised it as a great nation.
sentences.korean_translation: 세상 모든 사람이 그것을 위대한 나라라고 칭찬했다.

sentences.original_text: But now all the nations will see
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 모든 나라가 볼 것이다

sentences.original_text: that it is a disgusting place.
